Articles.Content:
hi i am quite a new player 

and only heard about this game 2 weeks ago

i need help finding mods

i have already found nova punch and c7

but i need more

this is also to help other people like myself

Demo:

Down Under

Probodobodyne

Paid:

Damned Aerospace

Damned Robotics

Cart

[http://xenolith.ws/?page=mod&id=70](http://xenolith.ws/?page=mod&id=70) (selfad ;P)

MechJeb

Deep Space Mission Pack (should work in Demo except 3 parts that grey out)

Bienvenidos a los foros de KSP!

Well speaking of mods, I recommend these as your starting set (well since you have NP and C7 already...):

KSP Silisko Edition (not the alpha one)

NovaPunch

KW Rocketry

C7 Aerospace + C7 Aviation (since spaceplanes are on its height now since 0.15)

Then feel free to try other mods! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

it just leads me to the post in ur electricity addon.
